venue.name: Uconn Storrs Campus, Homer Babidge Library, audio visual rm 2

item.description: VP candidate Judge Jim Gray will headline a political rally at The University of Connecticut as part of his east coast tour. The event will be held from noon to 1:30 pm in the Homer Babidge Library Audio Visual Room 2, on September 20th. We are working on additional peakers but the list is not finalized yet. The event is free and open to the public.
item.name: Jim Gray, Gary Johnson's VP coming to CT
